description:
Elevate your culinary creations with Shan Zafrani Garam Masala, a premium blend of aromatic spices. This 50g pack offers a rich, warm flavor profile perfect for curries, stews, and more.  Experience the authentic taste of Shan, a trusted name in South Asian cuisine.

Our Zafrani Garam Masala features saffron and a unique combination of carefully selected spices, expertly roasted and ground for optimal flavor.  It's 'V-Locked' for freshness, ensuring consistent quality and taste in every use.  This versatile masala is free from artificial preservatives.

Add a dash to enhance your favorite dishes or use it as a base for your own signature recipes.  Shan Zafrani Garam Masala:  Unlock the true potential of your cooking. Order yours today!

Elevate your cooking with Shan Karahi Gosht Masala, a premium blend of authentic spices designed for creating delicious Karahi dishes. This 50g pack delivers the rich, aromatic flavors of traditional Pakistani cuisine, effortlessly transforming your meals.  Our expertly crafted masala combines the finest ingredients, ensuring consistent, high-quality taste in every use.  It's perfect for both beginner and experienced cooks. 

This versatile spice mix is ideal for preparing tender and flavorful Karahi Gosht (mutton/beef).  Simply follow the easy recipe instructions on the pack for a restaurant-quality meal at home.  It contains a balanced mix of spices, including chili, coriander, cumin, and more, all carefully selected for their unique contribution to the Karahi flavor profile.  The masala is free from artificial colors and preservatives.

Experience the authentic taste of Shan Karahi Gosht Masala today! Impress your family and friends with restaurant-style Karahi dishes. Add this essential spice to your cart now and enjoy the convenience and deliciousness of Shan.

Experience the rich flavor of Jalpur's Original Besan Gram Flour, perfect for traditional Indian cooking.  This premium 1.2kg bag delivers the finest quality gram flour, freshly milled for superior texture and taste. Create delicious dishes with ease using this versatile ingredient. 

Made from carefully selected chickpeas, this flour is ideal for making savory snacks, flatbreads, and flavorful curries. Its smooth consistency blends seamlessly into batters and doughs.  The bag features a resealable design for optimal freshness and storage. 

Elevate your culinary creations with the authentic taste of Jalpur Besan.  Order yours today and discover the difference quality makes! Perfect for both experienced cooks and beginners.

Create authentic Korma dishes with Shan's Korma Masala! This 50g pack offers a convenient and flavorful blend of premium spices, perfectly balanced to deliver the rich, aromatic taste of traditional Korma.  Simply add to your favorite meat or vegetable base for a restaurant-quality meal at home. 

Shan Korma Masala is a recipe & seasoning mix, ideal for creating delicious Korma curries.  It's easy to use and delivers consistent results every time.  This particular blend is specifically designed for sale in Pakistan.

Elevate your cooking with the trusted quality of Shan.  Enjoy the authentic taste of home-cooked Korma with minimal effort!  Order yours today and experience the difference.

Experience the rich, authentic taste of Nihari with Shan's expertly blended Nihari Masala. This 50g pack delivers the perfect blend of spices for a flavourful and aromatic Nihari dish, easily recreating restaurant-quality results at home.  Our unique recipe uses a time-tested combination of premium spices, creating a deep and complex flavor profile that's both savory and warming.  

This easy-to-use masala contains carefully selected ingredients, roasted and ground to perfection, to ensure consistent quality and flavor in every use.  Simply add to your preferred Nihari recipe for a delicious and convenient cooking experience.  No artificial preservatives or additives are used, ensuring a natural and wholesome spice blend.

Elevate your culinary skills with Shan Nihari Masala. Perfect for family dinners or special occasions, this masala is a must-have for every spice lover.  Order yours today and unlock the secrets to a truly authentic Nihari experience!

Enhance your cooking with National Pure Garlic Powder! This 50g pack delivers a strong, fresh garlic aroma and flavor to all your dishes.  Made with freshly ground garlic, it's perfect for adding a zesty punch to soups, stews, sauces, and marinades. 

National's Pure Garlic Powder offers a convenient and consistent way to add the delicious taste of garlic without the prep work. It's freshly ground for maximum flavor and aroma, and boasts a strong, satisfying taste.  This 50g pack is ideal for home cooks and professional chefs alike. 

Elevate your culinary creations with the rich, robust flavor of National Pure Garlic Powder. Add it to your favorite recipes for an intense garlic flavor that's sure to impress. Buy now and experience the difference!

Elevate your culinary creations with National Garam Masala Powder, a 50g pack of authentic, finely ground spice blend. This traditional mix of 7 spices delivers a rich, warm flavor perfect for curries, stews, and marinades.  It's the perfect addition to any kitchen, offering unparalleled depth and complexity to your dishes. 

National Garam Masala is expertly crafted using a time-honored recipe, ensuring a consistent and delicious taste every time.  Its convenient 50g packaging is ideal for frequent use and easy storage.  This blend is free from artificial colors and preservatives, guaranteeing the purest flavor. 

Add a dash to your favorite recipes for a burst of authentic flavor.  Perfect for both everyday cooking and special occasions. Enhance your dishes with the trusted quality of National. Try it today!

Create authentic, restaurant-quality Seekh Kebabs with Shan's Seekh Kabab Masala! This 50g pack delivers the perfect blend of spices for juicy, flavorful kebabs.  Simply mix with your ground meat, shape, and grill to perfection. Impress your family and friends with delicious, homemade kebabs every time.

Shan's expertly crafted blend contains a unique combination of premium spices, creating a rich and aromatic flavor profile.  It's easy to use, simply follow the instructions on the pack for the best results.  Perfect for BBQs, family dinners, or any occasion.

Elevate your grilling game with Shan! This vegetarian-friendly masala is free from artificial preservatives and additives. Get yours today and experience the authentic taste of Shan.  Perfect for both beginners and experienced cooks.

Elevate your cooking with Shan Achar Gosht Masala, a premium spice blend for creating authentic, flavorful dishes. This 50g pack delivers the rich, aromatic taste of traditional South Asian cuisine, easily transforming everyday meals into culinary masterpieces.  Its unique blend of spices creates a delicious depth of flavor perfect for meat dishes.

This convenient recipe & seasoning mix contains a perfectly balanced combination of high-quality spices, ensuring consistent results every time.  Simply add to your favorite meat recipes for an unforgettable taste experience. No artificial preservatives or additives are used, only the finest natural ingredients.

Unlock the secrets of authentic South Asian flavors.  Perfect for lamb, beef, or goat dishes.  Impress your family and friends with effortlessly delicious meals. Order your Shan Achar Gosht Masala today!

Elevate your culinary creations with Shan Chaat Masala, a vibrant blend of spices perfect for adding a tangy and aromatic twist to your favorite dishes. This 100g pack is ideal for creating delicious chaat, garnishing snacks, or enhancing the flavor of curries and other savory meals.

Shan Chaat Masala is a versatile seasoning mix that combines the finest quality ingredients, creating a unique flavor profile that's both savory and slightly sweet.  It's a vegetarian-friendly option and contains no artificial preservatives. The perfect finishing touch for your culinary masterpieces.

Add a dash of Shan Chaat Masala to your snacks, salads, and more to experience a burst of authentic South Asian flavor. It's the secret ingredient to creating memorable meals. Order yours today!
